about.title: About
about.subtitle: The African Network of Cinema Exhibitors and Distributors, a key player in contemporary African cinema.
about.paragraph1: Founded in 2021, REDA is a Senegalese-based association headquartered in Dakar, bringing together exhibitors and distributors from five African countries.
about.paragraph2: Our mission is to preserve, develop and promote African cinemas while giving African films a central place.
about.paragraph3: REDA positions itself as a reliable and structured partner for film distribution and exhibition in Africa.
about.highlight: A demanding program, strong cultural commitment and a high-quality cinema experience.

hero.subtitle: Network of African Cinema Exhibitors and Distributors
hero.description: Uniting African cinemas to promote, distribute and showcase African and francophone film productions to all audiences.

missions.subtitle: A clear and ambitious vision to structure, develop and strengthen the African cinema ecosystem.

structuring.title: Industry structuring
structuring.description: To sustainably structure film exhibition and distribution in Africa by bringing stakeholders together around common professional standards.

valuation.title: Promotion of productions
valuation.description: To defend and promote African and francophone productions and build a viable and sustainable economic model around them.

distribution.title: Distribution strengthening
distribution.description: To consolidate film distribution in Africa in order to improve the circulation of works across the continent and internationally.

digital.title: Digital transition
digital.description: To support the digitalization and modernization of African cinemas to meet contemporary technical requirements.
